GameModel.Materials

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Materials.Material
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Combinable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Coal, Cotton, Feather, Hair, Leather, Metal, Skin, Stone, Wood

    public abstract class Material
extends java.lang.Object
implements Combinable
    Material is used to create things. It can be combined with other material to create something new.

    • Method Detail

      • combinesWith

        public boolean combinesWith(Material other)
        Checks to see if this material may be combined with the specified material
        Parameters:
        other - the material to be combined with
        Returns:
        true if the materials may be combined

      • inheritAttribute

        public void inheritAttribute(Attribute a)
        Inherits the given attribute. If already inherited, then the attribute values are combined
        Parameters:
        a - the attribute to inherit

      • inheritAttributes

        public void inheritAttributes(Material other)
        Inherits all attributes of the given material. Any duplicates combine their values
        Parameters:
        other - the material to inherit attributes from

                 throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
